title: FS  PSA 4.5 EPDG T206 Christy Mathewson

posts.post_title: FS  PSA 4.5 EPDG T206 Christy Mathewson
posts.post_content: Selling  PSA 4.5  El Principe De Gales  Christy Mathewson $12,500--check scans--Beautiful Card--Snow White Borders--Great Color--Clean Tough Back for this card--Paypal-Venmo or Check--thanks, Don ===No recent comps on this card in VCP--a PSA 7 went $51,600 4/22 in Heritage
